kepcoin.title: Kepcoin
kepcoin.subtitle: Keep track of every Kepcoin you earn and spend across KEP.uz.
kepcoin.balanceHint: This balance refreshes whenever you complete tasks, contests, or purchases.

empty.earns: You have not earned any Kepcoin yet.
empty.spends: You have not spent any Kepcoin yet.

error.earns: Could not load your earning history. Please try again.
error.spends: Could not load your spending history. Please try again.

streak.title: Streak freeze
streak.description: Freezing automatically saves your streak if you miss a day and do not complete daily tasks.
streak.purchaseDialogBody: Spend Kepcoin to protect your streak for one day.
streak.error: Could not complete the purchase. Please try again.

howToEarn.title: How to earn Kepcoin
howToEarn.description: To earn this currency, you need to contribute to the development of the system. For example:

items.label: For being the winner in daily, weekly, and monthly challenge ratings
For helping edit problems (solutions, translation, tags, similar problems)

howToSpend.title: How to spend Kepcoin
howToSpend.description: Redeem Kepcoin for perks, learning resources, and profile boosts.

items.label: View a test with a failed solution
Test function when editing code (full run)
Double rating change in contest (even if negative, it doubles)
Maintain rating in contest (no bonus if the change is negative)

shop.title: Shop
shop.subtitle: Redeem your Kepcoins for gear and accessories inspired by KEP.uz.
shop.loadError: Could not load products right now. Please try again soon.
shop.emptySubtitle: Come back later to spend your Kepcoins on new items.

calendar.title: Calendar
calendar.subtitle: See upcoming training slots and events on the shared calendar.
calendar.loadError: Could not load calendar events. Please try again soon.
calendar.emptySubtitle: New training times will appear here once they are published.

filters.name: Name
filters.namePlaceholder: Search by first or last name
